ModMetaData.name: Mechanical Defense 2 - Deep Storage (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Update of mipens mod for RimWorld 1.1 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1255682921
I removed the dependency to the old "Base"-mod since it could just be replaced with a patch-operation instead.
Support-chat: https://discord.gg/SuhwVpM
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/MechanicalDefense2DeepStorage
--- Original Description --- "Mechanical Defense 2" (MD2)
requires extended storage mod now!
- deep storage
>>Deep Storage Unit - A storage unit that is used to store a large quantity of a type of item.
update by sulusdacor
Download links for Dropbox or Steamworkshop link can be found in the ludeon forum thread linked above.
